channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: School of Science Arch Field Trip: Museum of the Earth | June 24
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 24, 2025 6:00 AM - 5:00 PM - ALL MAJORS WELCOME! Students can explore 8,000-square-feet of exhibitions that takes visitors on a journey through 4.5 billion years of history. Exhibits include the Hype Park Mastodon, the 44-foot long Right Whale #2030 skeleton and the Coral Reef Aquaria. A one-hour program on Evolution and the Fossil Record is also included. Free breakfast and lunch will be provided. Meet at RPI Union horseshoe entrance at 6AM, bus departure at 6:30AM. Return…
item.author: Students

item.title: Summer 2025 Session II Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Friday, June 13, 2025 (all day) - Summer 2025 Session II student course evaluations are now open. The evaluation period is from 6/13 through 6/27. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Friday, June 27, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Hosts Leading & Managing Graduate Certificates Review June 24
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 24, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., on a 30-minute information session highlighting Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Leading Change and Innovation, and Managing Technical Organizations. Expect to learn how individuals can manage and lead effective cross-functional teams, and implement changes designed to optimize the realization of tactics and strategies. Please complete the form if you plan to join.
item.author: Community

item.title: 2025 National Organic Chemistry Symposium (NOS) June 22-26
item.description: The 49th NOS will be held June 22–26, at RPI! Sponsored by the ACS Division of Organic Chemistry, this 100th-anniversary event is expected to welcome over 450 participants from across the United States & around the world. It will feature top speakers highlighting advances in synthesis, biocatalysis, polymers, and drug discovery. Nobel Laureate Dr. Morton Medhal will give the keynote. The program also includes poster sessions and career panels. More info: https://www.nationalorganicsymposium.org/
item.author: Community

item.title: Glow Yoga x Pride | June 23
item.description: Date: Monday, June 23, 2025 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM - Join us for a vibrant, blacklight yoga experience celebrating love, identity, and community. We’ll bring the glow sticks, energizing music, and all the rainbow vibes — you bring your fabulous self and a mat, if you have one. No mat? no problem - we will provide some. Whether you’re a seasoned yogi or just curious to try something new, this beginner-friendly class is all about moving your body, expressing yourself, and lighting up the night with…
item.author: Community

item.title: New RecWell at the Mueller Center Hours
item.description: Until further notice, we’re operating on adjusted hours as we address the ongoing HVAC issues. New RecWell at the Mueller Center Hours will be 9:00am - 2:00pm daily. Any changes will be updated regularly on our website: recwell.rpi.edu. We appreciate your patience and understanding!
item.author: Community

item.title: TIAA Confidential Counseling (In-Person) | June 24
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 24, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. To schedule your individual retirement counseling, please call TIAA at 1-800-732-8353 or online at https://shared.tiaa.org/public/publictools/events…
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Reminder for the Campus Card Office
item.description:
If your department has any Guest, Contractor, or Vendor cards expiring on or before July 1, 2025, please renew them by June 30 to avoid any access disruptions. Visit the Campus Card Office webpage and fill out an Access Request Form to renew any cards. Questions? We’re happy to help! Contact us at campuscard@rpi.edu. Thanks for your attention and cooperation!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
